posts.post_content: [Black Knight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Black Knight) is much better than White Knight. Even though White Knight isn't going to get [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade)d, neither is [Black Knight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Black Knight) because of his color. In addition, White Knights don't have an immunity to all of the white removal spells that have continued to multiply in standard recently, like [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring) and [Path to Exile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Path to Exile).
posts.html:
